catalog_info.title: Advanced Russian: Readings in Russian/Post-Soviet Studies
catalog_info.prereq: Recommended: Russian 101 and 103, Russian 102r, or placement at the level of Russian 111/113.
catalog_info.description: Reading and discussion of topics in the areas of history, economics, politics, and current events. Continued work on grammar and vocabulary with written exercises and compositions. TV viewing for comprehension development.
